Articles.Content:
They can produce 159, so if we wanted it to be a max of 4 turns then from turns till capture calculation, we will have the equation (BP)/40 rounded up to the nearest turn.

By the way, I was thinking about using hyper edit in order to make our lives easier. Hopefully it will work with dark multiplayer.

4 turns is more than a year, sieges have lasted more time in one city during the Middle Ages, no one is going to have 159 BPs on one planet anyway, i say we make the ratio BPs/15 and round from that number(this also gives the person being sieged time to respond)

4 turns is more than a year, sieges have lasted more time in one city during the Middle Ages, no one is going to have 159 BPs on one planet anyway, i say we make the ratio BPs/15 and round from that number(this also gives the person being sieged time to respond)

But if it takes that long, everyone will forget about it and it will become boring just waiting for the planet to be taken. How about at least divide by 20. We don't want things to go on too long.

Also Delfiler, or the AI! Fill in the recording time! So far it looks like saturdays will be combat day and maybe some during the week.

Edited October 4, 2014 by StrahmDude

Could you link the back-stories document on the main page as well?

Also, would this mod be ok to have?

I think we should avoid having to many mods. I don't even know if hyperedit will work, so I will say no. I want to avoid using to many mods.

Alright everyone! Since .25 is around the corner, we need to finish 2 things. Everyone needs to fill our the time schedule, and we all need to at least become friends with each other on skype. Once that is done, .25 is out, and dark multiplayer + hyperedit are updated, we will begin the test game to check balance and find if buildings are over or under powered! After that we can begin the real game!

We will also probably be recording a war series where we just set up battles and fight for no reason. That or other challenges like make huge structures and race to see who can blow it up faster with the new bombers!

Alright everyone! Since .25 is around the corner, we need to finish 2 things. Everyone needs to fill our the time schedule, and we all need to at least become friends with each other on skype. Once that is done, .25 is out, and dark multiplayer + hyperedit are updated, we will begin the test game to check balance and find if buildings are over or under powered! After that we can begin the real game!

We will also probably be recording a war series where we just set up battles and fight for no reason. That or other challenges like make huge structures and race to see who can blow it up faster with the new bombers!

The whole blowing up buildings the fastest i feel will be covered so much that it won't be interesting to do.

The whole blowing up buildings the fastest i feel will be covered so much that it won't be interesting to do.

By the way, just to make sure, I mean making structures the same way you make ship and then do bombing runs on them. That is just a idea, and I think setting up armies and blowing them up would be more interesting.

Let me clear some stuff up.

First. Defiler, you can only get 1 planet at max and that is if you really want a centralized zone to store stuff.

Secondly! Layth is NOT off limits. I just don't want people starting with it. The idea is it is such a strong planet that no one has claim over it yet.

Also thedogs is suppose to get territory.

Finally.... Defiler fill out the timesheet thing!
